H0.text: Who retired from the ‘Eggheads’ team in May 2014. Judith Keppel

H1.text: Who retired from the ‘Eggheads’ team in May 2014. CJ de Mooi

H2.text: Who retired from the ‘Eggheads’ team in May 2014. Anne Hegerty

H3.text: Who retired from the ‘Eggheads’ team in May 2014. DAPHNE Fowler

A4.text: He then returned to the main version of Eggheads replacing Daphne Fowler.

A5.text: He appeared in broadcast episodes until August 2012 and was replaced on the show by Dave Rainford.
